title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: When clicking on 'Close all saved' option in the menu, the file is not closed and remains open.
EB: The file should be closed and no longer displayed as it has not been modified.
SR:
1. Open multiple files in the application.
2. Make sure none of the files have unsaved changes.
3. Click on the 'Close all saved' option in the menu.
4. Verify that all the open files are closed and no longer displayed.
